title: Mercy: Goodbye Sanity
description: Everyone knows the story where the beautiful girl gets taken by a monster.The one where the monster ends up being some poor tortured soul with a fucked up past.Love prevails, and then they live happily ever fucking after.Well, this is my story and it isnâ€™t a fairytale.I loved my monster too.But that was before he took me.My reality is dark.His demons are darker.
author: Natalie Bennett
